description_for_human: Plugin for managing a wordpress site, you can add, get, remove WP posts and plugins.
description_for_model: Plugin for managing a wordpress site, you can add, get, remove WP posts and plugins. Adding post content should be good html code for json that should not occur any parse error. You must not generate any site parameter for /login endpoint and must ask users to input their wp site address. If users do not log in show them the unique login link from /login and don't show same login link more than once. After a new login you must get the refreshed auth token using the last uid you got. always use last uid and last token that you have. Compare and give your comment when find plugins. Using debug you should suggest how to solve specific warning or error.
